basic.blooming: Flowering period February, fruiting period November-March

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Likes warm, moist, sunny and airy environment
maintenance.watering: During March to October, water every day, keep soil moist in other seasons
maintenance.fertilization: Apply organic fertilizers in May to October once every 1-2 weeks
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead and diseased branches timely
